english.segment1: Tell them. even if they don't believe you. Just tell them. even if they don't receive you. Oh, tell them for me. tell them for me please. please, tell them for me. tell them that i love them. And i came to let them know.
english.segment2: Tell them. when it seems you are forsaken. just tell them. though it seems you are earthly shaken. Oh, tell them for me. tell them for me please. please, tell them for me. tell them that i love them. And i came to let them know.
english.segment3: Tell that lonely man who walks. the colds streets all alone. Tell that crying child. who doesn't have a home. Tell those hungry people dying. and lost in the desert. They don't even know that i care.
english.segment5: Tell them for me please. Tell them that i love them
english.segment6: Oh, just tell them on the streets. and on the high ways
english.segment7: and tell them and even on the bi-ways. Tell them I can mend the broken heart. and restore the ones who have parted. And i came to let them know. I came to let them know. And i came to let them know
english.segment8: They must know. they must know. ..must know.
